Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky dark brown; band of upright lotus buds in added white outline with added red centres; trace of red band below; exterior: brown band; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the interior and exterior decoration, see Louvre E8056 bis.17 and Boston 88.934.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0437) (phase 2)
